review:
Good service provided by the doctor. Very detailed examination. 

Proposed implant. Detailed explanation provided as well.

I have fear of doctors and hospitals in general. The only exception to this is Dr Jonathan Eric Rao whom I have been visiting from years now for any dental issues.

So much so that I have got my entire family to change their family doctor for dental issues to Dr Jonathan


He is very patient, well educated , expert and keeps patients in mind always and I have always had best results in my oral care.

Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a fantastic experience - visited for an RCT. Some people are blessed with talent and the doctor is clearly one of them! An RCT with zero pain - and he presented a thorough explanation of all case scenarios. Extremely glad to have found this clinic - Will 1000% recommend him to everyone!Thank you, Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Jonathan is not your typical dentist! 

********* ************** patient and methodical with his approach as well as providing a solution to the problem.

I visited Urban dental clinic for severe dental pain that kept escalating by the day. After a thorough examination and listening to my experience, Dr.Jon ruled out the common potential causes for the issue and explained the real underlying cause (Stress associated bruxism) as the source of the problem. 

I was recommended to go with RCT for the same issue by another gentleman of a dentist which I did not, thanks to doc Jon!

Step by step, he ruled out cavity related/wisdom tooth/potential dental fracture related causes. He recommended night guard as an option and emphasized to avoid teeth grinding consciously. Alas! That was it!!

In a time where it appears that other dentists seem to be busy exploiting their patients, Dr. Jonathan seems to have a different take. Couldn't be more thankful or grateful!****** ********** *** ** *** **** ******* **** - This is not a paid review, rather a real experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: went there for my mom treatment, overall experience was quite smooth. The way doctor explained and treated my mom is good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr.¬†Johnathan a Very professional dentist, was super helpful when had a severe toothache and to finding a solution in doing a crown. Highly meticulous and great quality of work. Very reassuring to give a clear and detailed explanation. Strongly recommended especially root canal treatment. Thank you for the overtime.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Partial Denture (Metal Based),
review: I  and my wife both got dental treatments from a very popular dental clinic of my home town in West Bengal.Since both of us were not feeling well with treatments there, we came to my son's place at Bangalore where we met Dr Jonathan. We were really overwhelmed with his behaviour and treatment as well .His assimilation about actual problem and  identification of remedy was really professional without any sign of advantageous monetary consideration.This aspect touched our heart and we wish him for ultimate success in the pursuit of his  professional progress . Good lucküôè

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I had to get my wisdom tooth extracted.for that i had to get some 2d and 3d x-rays done in some other labs since my nerve was too close .the extraction took around an hour .it pained for about a week .. about a month later i had to get a root canal done and a crown fixed ..since there wasn't much tooth structure,doc advised that i had to get a post fixed over which the crown would be placed ..initially i got root canal done ..two days later ,i had the post fitted with some temporary filling .on the same day ,the measurement for the tooth crown was taken ..and about a week later the crown was placed . Felt a little wierd while biting for a day , then i got used to it .

Doctors are very professional.Equipments are state of the art They maintain all COVID protocols as well (foot ,head and gloves).
The Dr. takes time and efforts to explain the medical condition to the patient. Well equipped clinic

review: This was my first dental treatment and I was apprehensive how it would go. Dr Jonathan made it a cakewalk experience. The root canal procedure took over an hour and the local anaesthesia wore odd by about 3 hours. There was pain however the doctor had prescribed a pain killer which did its work. I had a pleasant experience and would like to recommend Dr Jonathan for dental consultations.
